<title level="1" right="Hazard 18" pfs="">[Revisit Past Pains](/Hazards.aspx?ID=324)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 56

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A spirit locked in memories of its death flies down the hall, forcing intruders to experience the agony of its death.

---

**Stealth**
DC 45 (master)

**Disable**
DC 48 [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) (master) to calm the spirit or DC 46 [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (master) to ward off the spirit

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Share Pain** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Trigger** A creature enters the area; **Effect** Creatures within 30 feet take 6d12+41 mental damage (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save) as they experience the spirit's death.

---
**Reset**
1 hour.
name: Revisit Past Pains
